name: Bass Fishing 3D HD
description:
It is a dynamic bass boat driving!
It is real lure action!
You will play in breathless excitement.
The full 3D bass fishing game has finally arrived.

*Features of Free Version

-There are 3 levels you can play in challenge mode.
-You can select 5 types of lures.
-Advertisements are shown throughout the game.
-You can play "FREE FISHING" for a limited time only.

FEATURES:

You can steer your bass boat freely.
Find your own casting point by using dynamic driving bass boat.

There are 3 kinds of game mode: Tournament, Challenge and Free fishing.

Even beginners can feel reassured with the hint system!
Using the sonar, detect the shadow of a fish and find your point more quickly.

There are 6 Fishing Fields!!
Except Thunder Lake and Circle Lake,You have a limit of play time.

Over 10 different kinds of fish you can catch!!

There are 10 varieties of lures (top, shallow, deep, bottom) to choose from.
Seek out the right climate and time frame, then catch the big bass.

The camera is changed to an underwater camera when you are retrieving .
You can see real lure's action and tactics of the bass.

Because of the full 3D, it makes you feel a real performance.
We are sure you play with breathless excitement.

During the fight, you are also given advice on how to handle the rod.

Challenge mode was added.
You can enjoy a thrilling fishing experience under the time, season, climate, etc.

Game Center Leaderboards have been supported:
In the ranking of the got points in one game and in the ranking of each fish weight, who reach the top of player in the world?

NOTICE: You need User Registration for Game Center to use Game Center features.


Let's have fun sport fishing!!
